snippet: The anemic economy has left millions struggling to get ahead. Student debt is making it even harder for many of them, as they delay purchases of things like homes and cars.
abstract: Student debt, which recently exceeded $1 trillion, is making it harder for millions of younger Americans already struggling to get ahead in anemic economy; many are delaying purchases of homes, cars and other big-ticket items and creating drag on nation's economic growth.
lead_paragraph: The anemic economy has left millions struggling to get ahead. Student debt is making it even harder for many of them, as they delay purchases of things like homes and cars.

headline.seo: Student Loan Debt Is a Drag on the Economy, Too
headline.main: Student Debt Slows Growth as Young Spend Less
headline.print_headline: Heavy Load of Student Loan Debt Is Weighing on the Economy, Too
